meanings.definition: The action of selecting or choosing beforehand.
meanings.sent1: The preselection of the team captain was done based on leadership qualities.
meanings.sent2: The preselection of the menu items for the party was carefully planned.
meanings.sent3: The preselection of the best costume for the contest caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her preselection of the perfect gift was like finding a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The preselection of the winning entry stood out among the rest.

meanings.definition: The process of selecting candidates or options before a final decision is made.
meanings.sent1: The preselection of job applicants helped streamline the hiring process.
meanings.sent2: The preselection of courses for next semester is happening earlier this year.
meanings.sent3: The preselection of the best movie to watch led to a fun movie night.
meanings.sent4: His preselection of the perfect spot for the picnic was spot on.
meanings.sent5: The preselection of the best candidate for the role was a tough decision.
